headlines.description: A brace from Eddie Nketiah propelled Arsenal to a vital 4-2 win over Chelsea in a breathless London Derby at Stamford Bridge on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nketiah brace gives Arsenal big win over Chelsea

headlines.description: Everton striker Richarlison scored in second-half stoppage time to snatch a vital point in a 1-1 draw with Leicester City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Richarlison saves Everton in draw with Leicester

headlines.description: — Miguel Almiron’s well-taken goal handed Newcastle a sixth successive home Premier League win for the first time since 2004 as a 1-0 victory over Crystal Palace took the team past the 40-point barrier on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle beats Crystal Palace 1-0 to reach 40-point mark

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Manchester City

headlines.description: Manchester City defeated Brighton & Hove Albion to take sole position of the top of the Premier League table over Liverpool.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City beat Brighton to re-gain Prem lead
